apple_vendor_description: The couple with heart emoji, as seen on Apple devices, features two figures standing close, with a vibrant, glowing heart positioned between them, all rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and polished 3D effect.  The varied skin tones, from no skin tone to medium skin tone, are depicted with gentle shading, highlighting the unity and love shared between them. This emoji on Apple devices beautifully symbolizes a blossoming relationship, deep affection, or a strong bond.
